name: infra_service
schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><xs:schema xmlns:tns="http://einfracentral.eu" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://einfracentral.eu" version="1.0">
        
  
    <xs:import schemaLocation="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/madgeek-arc/resource-catalogue/public_api_new/eic-registry-model/src/main/resources/schema2.xsd"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="bundle" type="tns:bundle"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="catalogue" type="tns:catalogue"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="catalogueBundle" type="tns:catalogueBundle"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="dataSource" type="tns:dataSource"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="dataSourceBundle" type="tns:dataSourceBundle"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="emailMessage" type="tns:emailMessage"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="event" type="tns:event"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="helpdesk" type="tns:helpdesk"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="helpdeskBundle" type="tns:helpdeskBundle"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="identifier" type="tns:identifier"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="infraService" type="tns:infraService"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="loggingInfo" type="tns:loggingInfo"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="metadata" type="tns:metadata"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="metric" type="tns:metric"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="migrationStatus" type="tns:migrationStatus"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="monitoring" type="tns:monitoring"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="monitoringBundle" type="tns:monitoringBundle"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="monitoringGroup" type="tns:monitoringGroup"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="multimediaPair" type="tns:multimediaPair"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="provider" type="tns:provider"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="providerBundle" type="tns:providerBundle"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="providerLocation" type="tns:providerLocation"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="providerMainContact" type="tns:providerMainContact"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="providerMerilDomain" type="tns:providerMerilDomain"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="providerPublicContact" type="tns:providerPublicContact"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="providerRequest" type="tns:providerRequest"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="rangeValue" type="tns:rangeValue"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="service" type="tns:service"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="serviceCategory" type="tns:serviceCategory"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="serviceMainContact" type="tns:serviceMainContact"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="serviceProviderDomain" type="tns:serviceProviderDomain"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="servicePublicContact" type="tns:servicePublicContact"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="useCasesPair" type="tns:useCasesPair"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="user" type="tns:user"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="vocabulary" type="tns:vocabulary"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="vocabularyCuration" type="tns:vocabularyCuration"/>
        
  
    <xs:element name="vocabularyEntryRequest" type="tns:vocabularyEntryRequest"/>
        
  
    <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="bundle">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="active" type="xs:boolean"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:identifier"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="latestAuditInfo" type="tns:loggingInfo"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="latestOnboardingInfo" type="tns:loggingInfo"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="latestUpdateInfo" type="tns:loggingInfo"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:loggingInfo"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:metadata"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:migrationStatus"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="suspended" type="xs:boolean"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="identifier">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="alternativeIdentifiers">
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="alternativeIdentifier" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="hidden" type="xs:boolean"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="originalId" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="loggingInfo">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="actionType" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="comment" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="date" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="userEmail" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="userFullName" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="userRole" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="metadata">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="modifiedAt" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="modifiedBy" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="originalId" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="false" name="published" type="xs:boolean"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="registeredAt" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="registeredBy" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="source" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="terms">
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="term" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="migrationStatus">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="comments">
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="comment" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="migrationDate" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="modelVersion" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="modified" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element default="null" minOccurs="0" name="resolutionDate" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="catalogue">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="abbreviation" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[An abbreviation of the (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic) Catalogue Name.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="affiliations">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Catalogues that are members or affiliated or associated with other organisations should list those organisations here.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="affiliation" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[A high-level description of the Catalogue in fairly non-technical terms, with the vision, mission, objectives, background, experience.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hostingLegalEntity" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Name of the organisation legally hosting (housing) the Catalogue or its coordinating centre.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[A persistent identifier, a unique reference to the  (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic) Catalogue in the context of the EOSC Portal.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="legalEntity" type="xs:boolean">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[A Y/N question to define whether the (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic) Catalogue is owned by a Legal Entity or not.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="legalStatus" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Legal status of the (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic ) Catalogue Owner. The legal status is usually noted in the registration act/statutes.
For independent legal entities (1) - legal status of the Catalogue. For embedded Catalogues (2) - legal status of the hosting legal entity.
It is also possible to select Not a legal entity.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="location" type="tns:providerLocation">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Physical location of the Catalogue.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="logo" type="xs:anyURI">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Link to the logo/visual identity of the Catalogue.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="mainContact" type="tns:providerMainContact">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Catalogue's main contact info.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="multimedia">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Link to video, slideshow, photos, screenshots with details of the Provider.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="multimedia" type="tns:multimediaPair"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Full Name of the (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic) Catalogue.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="networks">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Catalogues that are members of networks should list those networks here.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="network" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="participatingCountries">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Catalogues that are funded/supported by several countries should list here all supporting countries (including the Coordinating country).]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="participatingCountry" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="publicContacts">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[List of the Catalogue's public contacts info.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="publicContact" type="tns:providerPublicContact"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="scientificDomains">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[A named group of providers that offer access to the same type of resource or capabilities.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="scientificDomain" type="tns:serviceProviderDomain"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tags">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Keywords associated to the Catalogue to simplify search by relevant keywords.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="tag" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="users">
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:user"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="website" type="xs:anyURI">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Website with information about the (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic) Catalogue.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="providerLocation">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="city" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[City of incorporation or Physical location of the Provider or its coordinating centre in the case of distributed, virtual, and mobile providers.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="country" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Country of incorporation or Physical location of the Provider or its coordinating centre in the case of distributed, virtual, and mobile providers.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="postalCode" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Postal code of incorporation or Physical location of the Provider or its coordinating centre in the case of distributed, virtual, and mobile providers.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="region" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Region of incorporation or Physical location of the Provider or its coordinating centre in the case of distributed, virtual, and mobile providers.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="streetNameAndNumber" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Street and Number of incorporation or Physical location of the Provider or its coordinating centre in the case of distributed, virtual, and mobile providers.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="providerMainContact">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Email of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="firstName" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[First Name of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="lastName" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Last Name of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="phone" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Phone of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="position" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Position of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="multimediaPair">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="multimediaName" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Short description of the Multimedia content.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="multimediaURL" type="xs:anyURI">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Link to video, slideshow, photos, screenshots with details of the Provider.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="providerPublicContact">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Email of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="firstName" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[First Name of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="lastName" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Last Name of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="phone" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Phone of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="position" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Position of the Provider's main contact person/Provider manager.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="serviceProviderDomain">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="scientificDomain" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[The branch of science, scientific discipline that is related to the Resource.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="scientificSubdomain" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[The subbranch of science, scientific subdicipline that is related to the Resource.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="user">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="email" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="surname" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="catalogueBundle">
                
    
        <xs:complexContent>
                        
      
            <xs:extension base="tns:bundle">
                                
        
                <xs:sequence>
                                        
          
                    <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:catalogue"/>
                                        
          
                    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="xs:string"/>
                                      
        
                </xs:sequence>
                              
      
            </xs:extension>
                      
    
        </xs:complexContent>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="dataSource">
                
    
        <xs:complexContent>
                        
      
            <xs:extension base="tns:service">
                                
        
                <xs:sequence>
                                        
          
                    <xs:element name="dataSourceClassification" type="xs:string">
                                    
                        <xs:annotation>
                                          
                            <xs:documentation>
                                                
                                <![CDATA[The specific type of the data source based on the vocabulary defined for this property]]>
                                              
                            </xs:documentation>
                                        
                        </xs:annotation>
                                  
                    </xs:element>
                                        
          
                    <xs:element name="jurisdiction" type="xs:string">
                                    
                        <xs:annotation>
                                          
                            <xs:documentation>
                                                
                                <![CDATA[The property defines the jurisdiction of the users of the data source, based on the vocabulary for this property]]>

a) is a node of an ESFRI project, b) is an ESFRI project, c) is an ESFRI landmark, d) is not an ESFRI project or landmark.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hostingLegalEntity" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Name of the organisation/institution legally hosting (housing) the provider/research infrastructure or its coordinating centre.
A distinction is made between: (1) research infrastructures that are self-standing and have a defined and distinct legal entity,
(2) research infrastructures that are embedded into another institution which is a legal entity (such as a university, a research organisation, etc.).
If (1) - name of the research infrastructure, If (2) - name of the hosting organisation.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[A persistent identifier, a unique reference to the Provider in the context of the EOSC Portal.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="legalEntity" type="xs:boolean">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[A Y/N question to define whether the Provider is a Legal Entity or not.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="legalStatus" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Legal status of the Provider. The legal status is usually noted in the registration act/statutes. For independent legal entities (1) - legal status of the Provider.
For embedded providers (2) - legal status of the hosting legal entity. It is also possible to select Not a legal entity.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="lifeCycleStatus" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Current status of the Provider life-cycle.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="location" type="tns:providerLocation">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Physical location of the Provider or its coordinating centre in the case of distributed, virtual, and mobile Providers.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="logo" type="xs:anyURI">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Link to the logo/visual identity of the Provider.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="mainContact" type="tns:providerMainContact">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Provider's main contact info.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="merilScientificDomains">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[MERIL scientific domain / subdomain classification.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="merilScientificDomain" type="tns:providerMerilDomain"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="multimedia">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Link to video, slideshow, photos, screenshots with details of the Provider.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="multimedia" type="tns:multimediaPair"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Full Name of the Provider/Organisation offering the resource and acting as main contact point.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nationalRoadmaps">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Provider's participation in a national roadmap.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="nationalRoadmap" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="networks">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Providers that are members of networks should list those networks here.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="network" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="participatingCountries">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Providers/Research Infrastructures that are funded by several countries should list here all supporting countries (including the Coordinating country).]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="participatingCountry" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="publicContacts">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[List of the Provider's public contacts info.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="publicContact" type="tns:providerPublicContact"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="scientificDomains">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[A named group of providers that offer access to the same type of resource or capabilities.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="scientificDomain" type="tns:serviceProviderDomain"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="societalGrandChallenges">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Providers participation in the Grand Societal Challenges defined by the European Commission.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="societalGrandChallenge" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="structureTypes">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Defines the Provider structure type (single-sited, distributed, mobile, virtual, etc.).]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="structureType" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tags">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Keywords associated to the Provider to simplify search by relevant keywords.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="tag" type="xs:string"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="users">
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:user"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="website" type="xs:anyURI">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[Website with information about the Provider.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="providerMerilDomain">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="merilScientificDomain" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[MERIL scientific domain classification.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="merilScientificSubdomain" type="xs:string">
                        
                <xs:annotation>
                              
                    <xs:documentation>
                                    
                        <![CDATA[MERIL scientific subdomain classification.]]>
                                  
                    </xs:documentation>
                            
                </xs:annotation>
                      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="providerBundle">
                
    
        <xs:complexContent>
                        
      
            <xs:extension base="tns:bundle">
                                
        
                <xs:sequence>
                                        
          
                    <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:provider"/>
                                        
          
                    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="xs:string"/>
                                        
          
                    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="templateStatus" type="xs:string"/>
                                      
        
                </xs:sequence>
                              
      
            </xs:extension>
                      
    
        </xs:complexContent>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="providerRequest">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="date" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="isRead" type="xs:boolean"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="tns:emailMessage"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="providerId" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="rangeValue">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="fromValue" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="toValue" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="vocabulary">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="description" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="extras" type="tns:extrasMapType"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parentId" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="vocabularyCuration">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="entryValueName" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parent" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rejectionReason" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="resolutionDate" type="xs:dateTime"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="resolutionUser" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="vocabulary" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="vocabularyEntryRequests">
                                
        
                <xs:complexType>
                                        
          
                    <xs:sequence>
                                                
            
                        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:vocabularyEntryRequest"/>
                                              
          
                    </xs:sequence>
                                      
        
                </xs:complexType>
                              
      
            </xs:element>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
        
  
    <xs:complexType name="vocabularyEntryRequest">
                
    
        <xs:sequence>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="dateOfRequest" type="xs:dateTime"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="providerId" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="resourceId" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="resourceType" type="xs:string"/>
                        
      
            <xs:element name="userId" type="xs:string"/>
                      
    
        </xs:sequence>
              
  
    </xs:complexType>
      

</xs:schema>
